attributes.action: consider banning the sale of things deemed 'bad' for our health or the environment, rather than taxing them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would include high emmision vehicles (band E and above), cigarettes, incandesant lightbulbs etc etc.  The proposal would force manufacturers to engineer solutions to health and enviromental problems if they wish to remain in the market.
